predicate.note: Frames file for 'coax' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Suasion1.

example.name: clear action
example.text: The brokers' hope has been that they could soon coax investors into [*-1] shifting some of their hoard into the stock market.
example.arg: [*-1] shifting some of their hoard into the stock market

example.name: not really an action
example.text: Mary coaxed John out of the closet with promises of chocolate cake.
